adventuringGear.name: Archaic text
adventuringGear.description: This book could be a religious text, a collection of ancient recipes, a romance novel, or vintage mechanical schematics.

adventuringGear.name: Autograppler, commercial
adventuringGear.description: You can attach this anchoring device to a cable line with an Interact action. Clamps automatically slide from the base of the autograppler along the attached cable, allowing it to be climbed like a knotted rope.

adventuringGear.name: Autograppler, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Functionally similar to the commercial version, but has a sensor to detect whether it has a firm hold, causing it to automatically retract if you critically fail your ranged attack to attach it.

adventuringGear.name: Cable line, commercial (50 Feet)
adventuringGear.description: This industrial cable is typically made of high durability plastic coated in metal. A commercial cable line is coated in titanium alloy.

adventuringGear.name: Cable line, tactical (50 Feet)
adventuringGear.description: This industrial cable is typically made of high durability plastic coated in metal. A tactical cable line is coated in adamantine alloy.

adventuringGear.name: Camping kit
adventuringGear.description: A camping kit contains a weatherproof tent for four Medium or two Large creatures, bedrolls, a fire igniter, 1 week of rations, and a survival knife.

adventuringGear.name: Chemalyzer
adventuringGear.description: This handheld sampling unit grants a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks to identify an unknown drug, medicinal, poison, or other chemical substance.

adventuringGear.name: Climbing kit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Includes 50 feet of cable line, a grappling hook, harnesses, pulleys, pitons, a hammer, and crampons. Allows you to attach yourself to the wall you’re Climbing.

adventuringGear.name: Climbing kit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Includes everything in a commercial kit. You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb while using a tactical climbing kit.

adventuringGear.name: Comm unit
adventuringGear.description: A pocket-sized device combining a portable computer and cellular communications device. Allows wireless communication at planetary range.

adventuringGear.name: Container, ordinary
adventuringGear.description: Includes backpacks, briefcases, duffel bags, and handbags. A container holds up to 4 Bulk and the first 2 Bulk of those items don’t count against your Bulk limits.

adventuringGear.name: Container, designer
adventuringGear.description: Functions as an ordinary container but grants a +1 item bonus to checks to Make an Impression on high society individuals while carrying it.

adventuringGear.name: Datapad
adventuringGear.description: Ubiquitous handheld computers incorporating a comm unit, microphone, speaker, camera, infosphere browser, and data storage.

adventuringGear.name: Emergency beacon
adventuringGear.description: Requires a battery. Transmits location and emits a flash of bright red light once per round. Signal can be picked up by devices and traced.

adventuringGear.name: Explorer’s canteen
adventuringGear.description: A thermos with two compartments. One filters contaminants from food/water. The other converts inserted UPBs into edible nutri-paste.

adventuringGear.name: Field scientist’s toolkit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Contains a chemalyzer, microscope, recording tools, and specimen bags.

adventuringGear.name: Field scientist’s toolkit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Contains scientific tools. Grants a +1 item bonus on Recall Knowledge checks using Nature or an appropriate Lore skill.

adventuringGear.name: Fire extinguisher, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Sprays foam in a 15-foot cone, putting out non-magical fires and attempting to counteract magical fire at 2nd rank.

adventuringGear.name: Fire extinguisher, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Sprays foam in a 15-foot cone. Counteracts magical fires at 4th rank with a +14 modifier.

adventuringGear.name: Fire extinguisher, advanced
adventuringGear.description: Sprays foam in a 15-foot cone. Counteracts magical fires at 6th rank with a +19 modifier.

adventuringGear.name: Flashlight, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Sheds bright light in a 30-foot emanation (and dim light in the next 30 feet).

adventuringGear.name: Flashlight, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light in the next 60 feet). Equipped with filters to block or dim the light.

adventuringGear.name: Hacking toolkit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Required for Computers checks to Hack computers. Allows access without a user interface via physical contact.

adventuringGear.name: Hacking toolkit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Required for Hacking computers. Adds a +1 item bonus to checks made with it.

adventuringGear.name: Hacking toolkit, advanced
adventuringGear.description: Required for Hacking computers. Adds a +1 item bonus and allows access to computers at a range of 30 feet.

adventuringGear.name: Holoskin, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Holographic projector mounted to belt/limb. Projects appearance of another creature of same size category.

adventuringGear.name: Holoskin, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Holographic projector. Adds a +1 item bonus to relevant Deception checks for Impersonation.

adventuringGear.name: Holospark
adventuringGear.description: Tiny holoprojector disguised as jewelry. Stores simple visual projection of personal flair and short audio.

adventuringGear.name: Hygiene kit
adventuringGear.description: Contains tools and products for grooming and hygiene. Specific kits include supplies for specific species.

adventuringGear.name: Infiltrator’s toolkit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Needed to Pick Locks or Disable Devices using Thievery skill.

adventuringGear.name: Infiltrator’s toolkit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Needed to Pick Locks or Disable Devices. Adds a +1 item bonus to checks to Pick Locks or Disable Devices.

adventuringGear.name: Infinity deck
adventuringGear.description: A replica of an artifact that appeared during the Gap, this deck of playing cards is used to play countless games.

adventuringGear.name: Lock, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Picking requires two successful DC 15 Thievery checks.

adventuringGear.name: Lock, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Picking requires two successful DC 20 Thievery checks.

adventuringGear.name: Lock, advanced
adventuringGear.description: Picking requires four successes at DC 25.

adventuringGear.name: Lock, superior
adventuringGear.description: Picking requires five successes at DC 30.

adventuringGear.name: Lock, elite
adventuringGear.description: Picking requires six successes at DC 40.

adventuringGear.name: Magboots
adventuringGear.description: Grant a +1 item bonus to Athletics to Climb metal surfaces. In zero-g, allows movement along metal surfaces without being untethered.

adventuringGear.name: Maker’s app
adventuringGear.description: Comm unit app containing formulas for Crafting common items.

adventuringGear.name: Maker’s toolkit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Needed to create items from UPBs with the Craft skill.

adventuringGear.name: Maker’s toolkit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Needed to create items from UPBs. Gives a +1 item bonus to the check.

adventuringGear.name: Medkit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Contains analgesics, bandages, etc. Necessary for Medicine checks.

adventuringGear.name: Medkit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Necessary for Medicine checks. Provides a +1 item bonus to such checks.

adventuringGear.name: Microgoggles
adventuringGear.description: Bulky goggles with adjustable magnifying lenses. Grant a +2 item bonus to skill checks benefiting from close vision.

adventuringGear.name: Microphone
adventuringGear.description: Cordless handheld device that records and transmits audio.

adventuringGear.name: Musical instrument, commercial (Handheld)
adventuringGear.description: Handheld instruments like autohorns, guitars, synth decks.

adventuringGear.name: Musical instrument, tactical (Handheld)
adventuringGear.description: Handheld instrument. Gives a +1 item bonus to Performance checks.

adventuringGear.name: Musical instrument, commercial (Heavy)
adventuringGear.description: Heavy instruments like drumdecks or theremins. Less portable.

adventuringGear.name: Musical instrument, tactical (Heavy)
adventuringGear.description: Heavy instrument. Gives a +1 item bonus to Performance checks.

adventuringGear.name: Portable amp
adventuringGear.description: Small device synced to audio source. Amplifies audio, reducing DC of Perception checks to hear it by 5.

adventuringGear.name: Radiation sweeper
adventuringGear.description: Handheld device detecting radiation within 120 feet. Emits pings indicating severity.

adventuringGear.name: Repair toolkit, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Contains tools for simple repairs. Used to Repair items using Crafting skill.

adventuringGear.name: Repair toolkit, tactical
adventuringGear.description: Used to Repair items. Gives a +1 item bonus to the check.

adventuringGear.name: Sunshades, commercial
adventuringGear.description: Sunshades make everyone look cooler.

adventuringGear.name: Sunshades, tactical
adventuringGear.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to saves against effects that cause blinded or dazzled condition.

adventuringGear.name: Wheelchair
adventuringGear.description: Automated mechanisms allow traversal of stairs, ladders, and uneven ground without additional difficulty.

medicalItems.name: Medpatch, commercial
medicalItems.description: The medpatch heals 1d6 Hit Points, and grants a +1 item bonus to saves against diseases/poisons for 10 min.

medicalItems.name: Medpatch, tactical
medicalItems.description: The medpatch heals 3d6+6 Hit Points, and the bonus is +1.

medicalItems.name: Medpatch, advanced
medicalItems.description: The medpatch heals 5d6+12 Hit Points, and the bonus is +2.

medicalItems.name: Medpatch, superior
medicalItems.description: The medpatch heals 7d6+18 Hit Points, and the bonus is +2.

medicalItems.name: Medpatch, elite
medicalItems.description: The medpatch heals 8d6+21 Hit Points, and the bonus is +3.

medicalItems.name: Medpatch, ultimate
medicalItems.description: The medpatch heals 10d6+27 Hit Points, and the bonus is +4.

medicalItems.name: Hypopen, commercial
medicalItems.description: Remove the fatigued condition or decrease the value of the clumsy or sickened condition by 1.

medicalItems.name: Hypopen, tactical
medicalItems.description: Produce the effects of a lower-level hypopen or remove the paralyzed condition.

medicalItems.name: Hypopen, advanced
medicalItems.description: Produce effects of lower-level hypopen or attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease.

medicalItems.name: Hypopen, superior
medicalItems.description: Produce effects of lower-level hypopen or attempt a flat check to end persistent poison or bleed damage (DC 10).

medicalItems.name: Hypopen, elite
medicalItems.description: Produce effects of lower-level hypopen or become quickened for 1 minute.

medicalItems.name: Hypopen, ultimate
medicalItems.description: Produce effects of lower-level hypopen or gain fast healing 10 for 1 minute (or decrease drained by 1).

medicalItems.name: Bone serum
medicalItems.description: Distilled from elebrian bone matter. Upon drinking it, you gain void healing for 1 hour.

medicalItems.name: Celebrity serum
medicalItems.description: Grants a +1 item bonus to Performance checks for 1 hour.

medicalItems.name: Commando serum
medicalItems.description: Grants 1d10+5 temporary Hit Points, as well as a +5-foot item bonus to any Speed you have for 1 minute.

medicalItems.name: Infiltrator serum
medicalItems.description: Grants a +1 item bonus to checks to Sneak and Disable a Device for 10 minutes.

medicalItems.name: Shimmerstone serum
medicalItems.description: Gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against mental effects and a +2 item bonus to checks to Recall Knowledge for 10 minutes.

medicalItems.name: Sharpshooter serum, commercial
medicalItems.description: Reduces your targets’ circumstance bonus to AC from cover by 1 for 5 minutes.

medicalItems.name: Sharpshooter serum, tactical
medicalItems.description: Reduces your targets’ circumstance bonus to AC from cover by 2 for 5 minutes.

medicalItems.name: Sprayflesh
medicalItems.description: Allows Treat Wounds on a target even if they are temporarily immune.
